name: french twist
notes:
follow my crafting adventures on my [substack][1].

do you have about 25 grams of that perfect fingering yarn left in your stash?  that is all you need to knit the french twist!

the point-to-point construction with the knit-as-you-go i-cord and scalloped edge will keep you wanting to knit just a little more... and a little more. the french twist scarflet will be the spice of any outfit, whether yours or a knitworthy friendâ€™s!

the french twist is perfect for beginners. here are the basic skills you will need to knit it:

long-tail cast on
knit
purl
kf&b (bar increase)
k2tog (decrease)
slip stitch
simple 4-stitch cable
pick up stitches
kitchener stitch

length from tip to tip: approximately 88 cm [34.5"]

width at widest point: approximately 9 cm [3.5"]


  [1]: https://caroknitsinthecity.substack.com/
